name: Tracks in Snow (In Development Version)
description:
Rika and Chiara have finally decided to leave their long time home and it just so happens to be Passover and are having second thoughts in their own ways. Tracks in Snow is a digital play about our relationships to where we come from and to each other. 

Rather than more traditional choice points and branching, this project allows for control of characters' physicality, which in turn affects the emotional tone of a scene. There are no right or wrong answers to the choices you make as you play, only how you want the scenes to feel.

Please note that this game is still in development, some assets are placeholder and parts of the game, including the script, will be unfinished.
